cast.overview: Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials, unexpected allies, and dark new forces at play.
cast.title: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil

cast.overview: Unlikely hero Mickey Barnes finds himself in the extraordinary circumstance of working for an employer who demands the ultimate commitment to the job… to die, for a living.
cast.title: Mickey 17

details.biography: Adam Colborne is an English actor best known for his recurring role as Baz in the hit series Ted Lasso. He was also a founding member of Boneyard Theatre, a theater troupe whose debut show Sandpits Avenue won the Herald Angle Award at the Edinburgh Festival in 2013. He trained in contemporary theatre at the East 15 Acting School of the University of Essex. He has worked as a workshop leader and educational speaker specializing in making work accessible for people with special educational needs. He has appeared in several TV series, including Good Omens and Wasted.
details.name: Adam Colborne
